price: Kuma Ya jẽfa, a cikin ƙasa, tabbatattun duwatsu dõmin kada ta karkata da ku, da kõguna da hanyõyi, ɗammãnin ku kunã shiryuwa.
arabic: وَأَلۡقَىٰ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَوَٰسِيَ أَن تَمِيدَ بِكُمۡ وَأَنۡهَٰرٗا وَسُبُلٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alqā fī al-arḍi rawāsiya an tamīda bikum wa-anhāran wasubulan laʿallakum tahtadūna
